sentences.en: A new wireless echo algorithm is described based on table actuation, stratification and simplification structure.
sentences.cn: 概要叙述了一种基于表驱动的 、 分层结构的、简化的回波算法.

sentences.en: A temperature stratification from the top to the bottom of the plenum is obtained.
sentences.cn: 从压力通迅室的顶部到底部可获得分层气流温度.

sentences.en: Because deposition is rapid, sorting and stratification are generally not well developed.
sentences.cn: 因为沉积作用是快速的, 分选作用和层理就得不到很好的发展.

sentences.en: Bill Venners: What is alternative to stratification of job roles?
sentences.cn: 比尔·凡纳斯: 用什么来代替这种分层的职位角色系统 呢 ?

sentences.en: Conclusions - MPS provides effective risk stratification across the entire spectrum of renal function.
sentences.cn: 结论 —— MPS为整个肾功能谱提供了有效的危险分层.

sentences.en: Existing risk stratification schemes have limited predictive ability.
sentences.cn: 现有危险分层方案的预测能力有限.

sentences.en: Long - term and seasonal trends in stratification in the California Current, 1950–1993.
sentences.cn: 1950–1993年加利福尼亚水流层结 长期 和季节性趋势.

sentences.en: Some stratification exists in the spray produced by any liquid propellant injector.
sentences.cn: 由任何液体推进剂喷注器所产生的喷雾都存在某些成层现象.

sentences.en: Stratification does not always work, since it often introduces other conflicts.
sentences.cn: 成层法并非总能解决这类问题, 因为这时常会引起另外的矛盾.

sentences.en: Stratification for volume, processing , molding, hanging furnace baking.
sentences.cn: 分层作卷, 加工成型, 吊炉烤制.

sentences.en: Stratification in polar waters normally is weak and transient.
sentences.cn: 极地水域的成层性是微弱而暂时的.

sentences.en: The data was analysed by means of stratification and standardization methods.
sentences.cn: 结果吸烟--饮酒组的高血压标化患病率(26.2%)显著高于吸烟-不饮酒组(17.7%).

sentences.en: The difficulty here is stratification of the two air streams.
sentences.cn: 这里存在的麻烦是两种空气气流的分层问题.

sentences.en: The Indian caste system is an example of social stratification .
sentences.cn: 印度的种姓制度是社会阶层化的一个例子。

sentences.en: These issues can be tackled in applying text stratification theory.
sentences.cn: 但这些问题我们都可以从文本分层理论中获得相应的解释与说明.

sentences.en: Under the condition of forced throughout flow, the distribution of velocity appears stratification structure alongaxial direction.
sentences.cn: 在强迫过流条件下,间隙内沿轴向呈现出分层结构的速度分布.

words.tran_cn: 分层的；形成阶层的；分为不同等级的

phrases.tran_cn: 热结层；温度分层；热分层现象

trans.tran_en: when society is divided into separate social classes
